evidence.claim: GoodCare Home Health Services implements secure data handling procedures compliant with HIPAA regulations.
The company offers integration capabilities for electronic health records (EHR) data exchanges.
GoodCare utilizes AWS cloud infrastructure for its services, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The health tech solutions they provide include support for relevant healthcare transaction standards such as FHIR and HL7.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found on X12 or clearinghouse use cases on the website.
